changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO wallet.players (username, password, balance, statusban) VALUES ('player1', 'player1password', 100.0, false); INSERT INTO wallet.players (username, password, balance, statusban) VALUES ('player2', 'player2password', 200.0, true);

changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO wallet.transactions (transactionid, playerid, amount) VALUES ('transaction1', 1, 50.0); INSERT INTO wallet.transactions (transactionid, playerid, amount) VALUES ('transaction2', 2, 25.0);
